entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_droid_factory_sergeant_hirka.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: That's good to hear. If you get the chance, please let Varias know we're doing ok. Droid patrols cut off our line of retreat so we fortified this room while waiting for reinforcements to arrive.
entries.s_12: I don't know who you are, but it's good to see another living soul.
entries.s_4: I glad to see your still alive. Thank you for letting Lieutenant Varias know we're ok.
entries.s_6: It's good to see another living being. We have been trapped here for a while now.
entries.s_8: You must be Sergeant Hirka. Lieutenant Varias sent me to look for you and your patrol.
